bio:treatment.description: Leaves 5–20(–50) × 1–2 mm. Peduncles 8–25 mm, glabrous or stipitate-glandular. Disc corollas 6.5–8.5 mm. Cypselae 3.2–4 mm; pappus elements 2–6 mm. 2n = 40.
Desert scrubs, soils from granitics, limestones, sandstones, volcanics;
Ariz., Calif., Nev., Utah; Mexico (Baja California, Baja California Sur, Sonora).
